sample_docs: ATS products are the industry standard for workforce management applications. Let ATS answer your biometrics questions and show you the potential benefits to your organization. Stay on top of all the latest happenings with ATS and check out the newly added multimedia section! ATS is the leading provider of biometric and non-biometric workforce management tools, offering state-of-the-art solutions such as the OPTIMUS terminal for time and attendance, payroll, and security access. Let ATS help you with your unique workforce management and human capital management goals. From basic time clocks to sophisticated employee self-service workforce management stations complete with biometrics (fingerscan and finger geometry), ATS has the solutions for you. ATS: Answers for HR Professionals ™ ATS announces hiring of Marcos Rivera Kane as Technical Support Engineer ATS announces NEMA 4X Workforce Management Terminal Receives IP65 Rating, Renamed MAXIMUS SEVERE DUTY ATS announces appointment of strategic alliance partner and authorized integrator in Taiwan ATS announces GSM cellular capability for Global Series™ ATS announces hostile environment protection for Global Series ATS announces Appointment of Larry Dawson as Vice President of Marketing ATS announces new U.K. office location ATS announces Color Touch version of OPTIMUS™ Workforce Management Data Collection Access Control Biometric Security Environmentally Sealed - NEMA 4X Supporting our partners and customers is priority number one! We are with you from start to finish. for Support © Copyright Accu-Time Systems 2005 - 2009 | |

Sit back, relax and find out how ATS can save your company time and money. With time and attendance taking up a larger portion of corporate expense today, save time and money by allowing Accu-Time Systems to work for you. As technology changes, we at ATS listen to our customers and provide answers for today's time and attendance demands. Our ACCU-TEAM is dedicated to providing the best possible product by way of: toll-free phone servicing/troubleshooting, helpful documentation, and a knowledgeable regional salesperson in your area! Also, locate our team at upcoming trade shows all around the world. Find out more about the Accu-Time Systems advantage and how we got here by researching our background . Give us a call: 1-800-355-4648 Check out our NEW, BETTER, and BIGGER products pages!! ATS offers a sneak preview into the future technology of time and data collection. The new biometric technology represents state-of-the-art engineering and a higher level of security. Bookmark this site and become a Sneak Peek member! Timely Innovations - True "C" Programmability (Biometrics & Auto ID) Product Reliability Certifications Accu-Rate Internal Diagnostics Global Connectivity - TCP/IP Ethernet Compatibility (Open Systems) ATS... products that put time on your side. | Contact Us | Products | Service Copyright© Accu-Time Systems, Inc. Accu-Time is a registered trademark of Accu-Time Systems, Inc. Accu-Time, whose policy is one of continuous improvement, reserves the right to change specifications without notice .

For Time and Attendance, Payroll and HCM Software Systems REQUEST A PRODUCT DEMO SEE WHAT WE HAVE FOR YOU! to help your business VIEW YOUR ANDROID OPTIONS Accu-Time Systems Carlos Bernal 2019-05-09T10:52:43+00:00 The hardware solution your business need. With our hardware products, Software tools and value-added services, Accu-Time Systems offer a secure, reliable and trusted way to capture and deliver your customer's employee time and attendance data to your back-end systems. Go to: Product overview Enhance your Workforce Management, Time & Attendance or Payroll Software with Powerful Employee Data Collection Solutions If tracking, collecting and managing time and attendance is a challenge for your workforce management customers, ATS has the solution. As a premier time clock vendor, we will work with you to provide a complete time and attendance solution for you and your customers that includes everything from high-quality terminals to integration software, application development, graphical interface, and tools. ATS will help you and your customers be more successful and get the most out of workforce management. Our Time and Attendance Solution include state-of-the-art, rugged and reliable time clocks , fully integrated and customized into your environment. ATS' outstanding implementation team enables customization of your terminal functionality and branding. By leveraging ATS' on-premise and cloud-based software, bi-directional communication of all data flows easily through your entire system. REQUEST A PRODUCT BRIEFING Contact Us Find out how ATS can help you grow. Whatever your needs are, we'll find the right hardware solution to achieve your business goals.
